reference_day.description: The day or date for which the funnel data is being accessed.

contacts_count.description: The total count of contacts in the funnel at a specific time.

qualified_contacts_count.description: The count of contacts that meet specific criteria to move to the next stage.

opportunities_count.description: The count of potential sales opportunities in the funnel.

sales_count.description: The count of successful sales made from the opportunities in the funnel.

visitors_count.description: The count of visitors who entered the funnel but have not converted yet.
